author: Andrew Beaton
title: How Much Is Your College-Basketball Team Worth?
text:
The big money of college basketball has never been in the news as much as it has during this past season. So before Monday’s national championship between Michigan and Villanova, it’s time to settle a different but relevant question: What’s the most valuable program in the country?
For the second straight season, it’s Kentucky, according to an annual study by Ryan Brewer, an associate professor of finance at Indiana University-Purdue University Columbus. Kentucky is worth $246.6 million, but that’s 28% lower than a year ago—with... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
